text: Manavare, nim'ma odeyanige anjiri mattu yava tandeyu tanna maganige kincittu upakarisalagada hagu yava maganu tanna tandege kincittu upakarisalagada dinada bhaya nimagirali. Khanditavagiyu allahanu kotta matu satyavagide. Innu, i lokada baduku nim'mannu vancisadirali mattu vancakanu nim'mannu allahana visayadalli vancisadirali
